name: Efigil Corp
overview:
Established in 2001 with a proven track record in wholesale distribution, marketing and sales of licensed Formula1 products. We are the importer-exporter & wholesale distributor of licensed Ferrari Bicycles, Baby Gears and Ferrari R/C cars (For Macau, part of Wynn Hotels Las Vegas). We supply Ferrari Dealers, Ferrari Stores, Ferrari Boutique Stores and Formula1 Specialty Stores in North & South America. With our warehouse facilities in Miami, Orlando & California, we are able to drop-ship products to our customers.

Warehouses: Miami, Florida Orlando, Florida Carson, California

Distribution Market: USA, Canada, Mexico and some overseas Countries

Products: License Ferrari Bicycle: Importer & Wholesale Distributor. Manufacturer: Komda Co. Ltd. License Ferrari Baby Gear products: Importer & Wholesale Distributor for North America. Manufacturer: Teamtex France, Teamtex USA

Customers: Major account (mass merchandisers, Dept. Stores), Specialty shops, Ferrari dealers of North America, Ferrari Store USA, Distributors and Retailers

Sales Projections: We expect this year about 2.5M with baby gear products and about 3M. with other products like Ferrari Bikes and Ferrari RC products.
